paragraph.paragraph: EiffelEnvision projects are compatible with Visual Studio .NET Source Code Control (SCC) packages such vsoriVisualSourceSafe60 0 Visual Source Safe . There are multiple vstskVersion_Control 0 SCC plug-in's for Visual Studio .NET, each with their own abilities and tailored functionality.

When integrating EiffelEnvision projects into a SCC repository not every project item will be integrated. vstskVersion_Control 0 SCC is bound to a project's physical location. For EiffelEnvision projects, this means,
url *Eiffel Libraries will not be integrated using SCC. This is because most url *Eiffel Libraries are not located in the project's url *Path but are instead located in some arbitrary location outside of the project. Well formed url *Projects will have all of their url *Project Items integrated into a SCC repository and none of the url *Eiffel Libraries .
To add a project into a SCC repository, see veoriAddingSolutionsProjectsToSourceCodeControl 0 Adding Solutions and Projects to Source Control .

To get started on using the facilities and functionality provided by SCC faction of Visual Studio .NET, see the documentation installed with your SCC compatible Visual Studio .NET plug-in. For user of Visual Source Safe, see vstskUsing_VSS 0 Using Visual Source Safe .

seealso.help_link: vstskAdd_Files_Folders_and_Projects_to_VSS 0 Adding Files and Folders to VSS
